author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10010911

KARMA: The Dark World has captivated horror fans globally with its dark mysteries and unique Orwellian aesthetic. As a thank you to the passionate community, Wired is thrilled to announce an all-new Cinematic Mode, coming soon as a free update to PS5!

-----------
Karma: the Dark World is a first-person cinematic psychological horror title where players will be investigating the deepest secrets of their suspects’ minds.

Set in an alternate timeline where post-war Germany has fallen into a dystopian state, ruled over by the Leviathan Corporation using mass surveillance and mind bending technology - what starts out as another case for Roam Agent Daniel McGovern, sees him uncover a world of deceit and betrayal, where he begins to doubt everything he knows, including his own identity. 

Inspired by the works of visionary creators such as David Lynch (Twin Peaks), Hideo Kojima (Metal Gear Solid, Death Stranding), and Christopher Nolan (Ince
title: Karma: The Dark World - Filter Mode Teaser | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Fall Guys: Ranked Knockout is HERE!

Step into the arena, climb the Ranks, and prove you’re the ultimate Bean. With new rewards, 22 Ranks, and an all-new competitive mode - it’s time to flop, dive, and grind your way to Superstar status.

From Rookie to Superstar, where will you land?

🎮 Play FREE now on PlayStation!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #fallguys
title: Fall Guys - Ranked Knockout Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/tower-of-fantasy/

Version 4.8 will be available on April 8! Meet the new character, Carrot, dive into story updates, and claim rewards. Log in and join in-game events to get up to 110 pulls and 1,000 Dark Crystals—FREE!

"Listen up: I'm a genius mechanic, Lola's kin, Wednesday Pirate, I play to win. Crash survivor, still standing tall, Kailo's first in Aida's call—2664, I break the wall! Just call me Carrot!"

——————————————————————

Tower of Fantasy, an open-world RPG, play for free now!
